test-case.name: Given an administrator opens the proposals page And the admin is older than 18 When the administrator hits the create proposal button Then the created proposal should be displayed in the proposal manager table

test-case.name: Given an administrator opens the proposals page And the admin is older than 18 When the administrator hits the create proposal button And the admin filters by today's date Then only proposal's last edited today should be displayed
test-case.title: Given an administrator opens the proposals page And the admin is older than 18 When the administrator hits the create proposal button And the admin filters by today's date Then only proposal's last edited today should be displayed

test-case.name: Given an administrator opens the proposals page And the admin is younger than 18 When the admin hits the xxx logo Then nothing should be displayed
